subject: Fashion and Apparel
Sporting Goods
Basketball (College)
Uniforms
lead_paragraph: The partners who launched Zubaz, the loose-fitting, zebra-print pants of the early 1990s, are enjoying something of a rebirth, thanks to Adidas’s new shorts for the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The partners who launched Zubaz, the loose-fitting, zebra-print pants of the early 1990s, are enjoying something of a rebirth, thanks to Adidas’s new shorts for the N.C.A.A. tournament.
